properties.name: me.ehp246.aufrest.connect-timeout
properties.description: Global timeout on waiting for connection. In ISO 8601 Duration. No timeout by default

properties.name: me.ehp246.aufrest.response-timeout
properties.description: Global timeout on waiting for response. In ISO 8601 Duration. No timeout by default.

properties.name: me.ehp246.aufrest.restlogger.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the built-in RestLogger.

properties.name: me.ehp246.aufrest.restlogger.masked-headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of header names that should be masked by.
